book.synopsis: Large Format for easy reading. Hugely influential work in which the author attempts popularise the notion of multidimensional geometry, but the book is also a clever satire on the social, moral, and religious values of the late 19th Centrury.
book.title_long: Flatland: A Romance of Many Dimensions
